alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 9:04PM CDT until August 13 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OTTAWA COUNTY... At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Quapaw, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Quapaw... Ottawa... Peoria... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 307 and 324. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
